arStrings.szText:
{c_important}Bone Spirit's{/c} Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c}.

Each enemy hit by {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} increases your Maximum Essence by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c}, for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} Essence.
{c_important}Bone Spirit's{/c} Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c}. Your Maximum Essence is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} per enemy hit.
